mode.name: SystemGroup
mode.query: SELECT rhnservergroup.id AS system_group_id , rhnservergroup.name , rhnservergroup.description , rhnservergroup.current_members , web_customer.name AS organization FROM rhnservergroup INNER JOIN web_customer ON rhnservergroup.org_id = web_customer.id WHERE rhnservergroup.group_type IS NULL ORDER BY rhnservergroup.id OFFSET :offset LIMIT :limit

mode.name: SystemGroupPermission
mode.query: SELECT rhnUserServerGroupPerms.server_group_id AS system_group_id , rhnUserServerGroupPerms.user_id AS account_id , rhnServerGroup.name AS group_name FROM rhnUserServerGroupPerms INNER JOIN rhnServerGroup ON rhnUserServerGroupPerms.server_group_id = rhnServerGroup.id ORDER BY system_group_id, account_id OFFSET :offset LIMIT :limit

mode.name: Account
mode.query: WITH latest_state_change AS ( SELECT rhnWebContactChangeLog.web_contact_id , rhnWebContactChangeState.label FROM rhnWebContactChangeLog INNER JOIN rhnWebContactChangeState ON rhnWebContactChangeLog.change_state_id = rhnWebContactChangeState.id LEFT JOIN rhnWebContactChangeLog older ON ( rhnWebContactChangeLog.web_contact_id = older.web_contact_id AND rhnWebContactChangeLog.date_completed < older.date_completed ) WHERE older.date_completed IS NULL ) SELECT web_contact.id AS account_id , web_contact.login AS username , web_customer.name AS organization , web_user_personal_info.last_name , web_user_personal_info.first_names as first_name , web_user_personal_info.title as position , web_user_personal_info.email , web_contact.created AS creation_time , rhnUserInfo.last_logged_in AS last_login_time , COALESCE(latest_state_change.label, 'enabled') AS status , web_contact.password like '$1$%' AS md5_encryption FROM web_contact INNER JOIN web_customer ON web_contact.org_id = web_customer.id INNER JOIN web_user_personal_info ON web_contact.id = web_user_personal_info.web_user_id INNER JOIN rhnUserInfo ON web_contact.id = rhnUserInfo.user_id LEFT JOIN latest_state_change ON web_contact.id = latest_state_change.web_contact_id ORDER BY account_id OFFSET :offset LIMIT :limit

mode.name: AccountGroup
mode.query: SELECT web_contact.id AS account_id , web_contact.login AS username , rhnusergroupmembers.user_group_id AS account_group_id , rhnusergroup.name AS account_group_name , rhnusergrouptype.id AS account_group_type_id , rhnusergrouptype.name AS account_group_type_name , rhnusergrouptype.label AS account_group_type_label FROM web_contact LEFT JOIN rhnusergroupmembers ON web_contact.id = rhnusergroupmembers.user_id LEFT JOIN rhnusergroup ON rhnusergroupmembers.user_group_id = rhnusergroup.id LEFT JOIN rhnusergrouptype ON rhnusergroup.group_type = rhnusergrouptype.id ORDER BY account_id, account_group_id OFFSET :offset LIMIT :limit
